name: A Speedrun Through Board Game Design Patterns of the 21st Century
description: Drawing on extensive research on the design patterns of over 700 board games, this session will highlight ten exemplary examples and unpack how their mechanics can be adapted to the context of Autonomous Worlds.

speakers.name: Will Robinson
speakers.bio: Will Robinson is a mentor at Alliance Accelerator and holds a PhD in game studies. Previously, he was a forensic crypto auditor.
